name: Catcher (itch) (StarArts)
description:
Play as a frog to catch insects and get high scores. When the timer reaches 0 it's Game Over. 

Fly = +1 pt

Butterfly = +3 pts

Goldfly = +10 pts

Timefly = +10 secs

Trash = -15 secs

(Mouse and Gamepad can be used in the windows executable version)

This game was created for Mini Jam 106 but was not submitted due to game breaking bugs
